text:
@jeffsessions @realDonaldTrump @JoeBiden First, are you high?
Second, statistically about 80% of the people at a 'superspreader' even will catch covid-19 and be symptomatic within two weeks. What are you going to do when your base is decimated? Or if your candidate ends up hospitalized on a ventilator?
